description.text: At 6th level and every 3 bloodrager levels thereafter, an id rager can select one of the following feats as a bonus feat: Combat Casting, Empath, Extra Rage, Intuitive Spell, Logical Spell, Psychic Combatant, Psychic Defender, Psychic Healing, Psychic Maestro, Psychic Virtuoso, Raging Concentration, Spell Focus, or Spell Penetration.
